data.requests: provide a simple and fast pure perl implementation of
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This request supersedes my requests for Heap::Number, Heap::String
    and Heap::Base which have all been absorbed in Heap::Simple

    The functionality is still the same as mentioned in these other
    requests: provide a simple and fast pure perl implementation of
    classic heaps.

    The approach in this module is less generic than the one in the
    standard Heap module, but in return you get back a much simpler and
    faster class, while still be applicable in almost all real
    applications.
